text: Reposting:  Hello all! We have a client that is on an older theme. They want five pages that have a different navigation than the rest of the site. So I just want to confirm what I would like to do before I pull the trigger. I was able to "Clone the theme" and apply that theme to the five new pages. What I would like to do now is change the menu/navigation that theme is using in the global header to the new menu/navigation I create. Doing all of this I should be able to keep these five pages as an "Intra Net" that the person would click around on. Am I correct? Mainly I want to make sure that the updates I do to the global header on the cloned theme only affects that cloned version of the global header.
